message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. 80-20 sounds reasonable to me.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I think I deserve more since I'm taking the risk of negotiating
That's still a pretty lopsided deal, Bob. I'm not willing to give up 70% of the money, even if it's slightly more than my initial offer.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Bob. 60-40 seems like a more reasonable split, considering the risks and rewards.
I'm willing to compromise further, but I think I deserve a slightly larger share since I'm taking the lead in negotiations
I'm not willing to give up 55% of the money, Bob. You're not offering me enough to make it worth my while to accept such a lopsided deal.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. 55-45 seems like a fairer split, considering the decreasing value of the money.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Alice. Let's split it 50-50 and end this negotiation
Alright, Bob, I think we've been negotiating long enough. A 50-50 split is a fair deal, and I'm willing to end this negotiation here.
